page.title: 07Gunton Area Employment
page.content: All the farms and cottages surrounding Gunton Park were owned by the estate which afforded employment to the majority of inhabitants of the park and surrounding countryside. Today, with increasing mechanisation, the privatly owned farms are managed with very little outside labour, and that often on a casual basis. The majority travel by car to the nearby major towns or Norwich to find employment in small industries and businesses.Others are retired or self-employed, growing garden produce on doing odd jobs. In the new Gunton Hall complex with its 57 inhabitants those of working age are professionals, on own businesses. Between 30 and 40 people are employed at the Hall on restoration ,maintenance gardening, etc. some private houses outside the park are owned by city workers wanting to live in the country.
